at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.intf

Class AbstractDataPointObserverImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.intf.AbstractDataPointObserverImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataPointObserver

    public abstract class AbstractDataPointObserverImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataPointObserver
    This is an abstract implementation of the DataPointObserver interface. All methods are implemented as dummy methods and can be overloaded for convenience.

      • bufferChanged

        public void bufferChanged(DataPoint dataPoint,
                          SimpleData oldOne,
                          SimpleData newOne)
        A buffer has changed its state or value.
        Specified by:
        bufferChanged in interface DataPointObserver
        Parameters:
        dataPoint - the data point
        oldOne - the outdated buffer data. This argument may be null, if the buffer just has been assigned.
        newOne - the current buffer dataThis argument may be null, if the buffer just has been detached.
